description: A tool for extracting arrays from a surface-registration template file and sampling them onto a surface mesh.

template_file.title: Template file
template_file.description: Full path to the template file. Template may contain multiple parameters. Example: 'somepath/mytemplate.tif#1'.

input_surface.title: Input surface file
input_surface.description: Full path to the input surface file, which provides the grid onto which the template data is sampled.

output_name.title: Output file name
output_name.description: Output file name. Saves the surface-worth of per-vertex values.

subjects_dir.title: Subjects directory
subjects_dir.description: Set the SUBJECTS_DIR. Default: use environment variable.

vertex_coords.title: Vertex coordinates
vertex_coords.description: Treat overlay as a surface and write it into a 3 frame parameterization.

average_flag.title: Average flag
average_flag.description: Average curvature patterns a given number of times.

frame_number.title: Frame number
frame_number.description: Paint the specified frame number to the output file. Default: 0.

square_root_flag.title: Square root flag
square_root_flag.description: Take the square-root of the output variable.

variance_params.title: Variance parameters
variance_params.description: Generate variance map. Requires subject name, hemisphere, and field number.

diag_vertex.title: Diagnostic vertex
diag_vertex.description: Invoke diagnostics for a specific vertex number.
